results.text: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
results.reason: This verse highlights the peace that comes from God, which is beyond human comprehension.
results.reflection: True peace is found in God, guarding our hearts and minds.

results.text: You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes that trusting in God results in perfect peace.
results.reflection: Steadfast trust in God brings unshakeable peace.

results.text: I have said these things to you, that in me you may have peace. In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.
results.reason: Jesus assures us of peace in Him despite the challenges of the world.
results.reflection: In Jesus, peace prevails over worldly troubles.

results.text: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace. And be thankful.
results.reason: This verse calls believers to allow Christ's peace to govern their hearts and relationships.
results.reflection: Christ's peace should guide our hearts and interactions.

results.text: The LORD gives strength to his people; the LORD blesses his people with peace.
results.reason: The verse declares that God provides both strength and peace to His people.
results.reflection: God's blessings include both strength and enduring peace.
